scripts.text:
insert into [dbo].[T_NSA_GR_STAGING] 
  SELECT [MANDT] as MANDT
     ,[CHARG] as CHARG
     ,rtrim([AIM_MATL_NO]) as MATNR_AIM
     ,[ID_MESSAGE] as TIMESTAMP
     ,rtrim([ACH_MATL_NO]) as MATNR_ACH
     ,[TOT_QTY] as QUANTITY
     ,rtrim([BASE_UOM]) as MEINS
     ,' ' as AUART
     ,[ORD_NO] as AUFNR
     ,[DOCU_DATE] as BLDAT
     ,[POSTG_DATE] as BUDAT
     ,[PCODE] as PCODE
     ,[PLANT] as PLANT
     ,[STOR_LOC] as LGORT
     ,'    ' as NO_OF_GI_REC
     ,'          ' as VBELN
     ,' ' as POSNR
     ,'          ' as MBLNR
     ,' ' as MJAHR
     ,' ' as RUECK
     ,' ' as RMZHL
     ,' ' as REV_RUECK
     ,' ' as REV_RMZHL
     ,isnull([ZBC_HEAT_NO],' ') as Z_HEAT_NO
     ,isnull([ZBC_THEO_WT],0.000) as Z_THEO_WT
     ,isnull([ZBC_SHIFT],' ') as Z_SHIFT
     ,[PROD_DATE] as Z_PROD_DATE
     ,rtrim([ZBC_MILL_SOURCE]) as Z_MILL_SOURCE
     ,isnull([ZBC_LENGTH],' ') as Z_LENGTH
     ,isnull(rtrim([ZBC_STANDARD]),' ') as Z_STANDARD
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_A
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_B
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_C
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT],' ') as Z_PCS_PER_HEAT
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_BLD],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD],' ') as Z_PCS_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_PCS],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_PCS
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_COIL],0.000) as Z_KG_PER_COIL
     ,isnull([ZBC_ACT_COI_WT],0.000) as Z_ACT_COI_WT
     ,'        ' as Z_MAC_NO
     ,'        ' as Z_COIL_NO
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_CUT
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_BEND
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_LINK
     ,isnull([CUT_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_CUT_PER_TON
     ,isnull([BEND_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_BEND_PER_TON
     ,isnull([LINK_PER_TON],0.00) as Z_LINK_PER_TON
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_GRA
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_REF
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_END
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_1
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_2
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_1
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_2
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_PNT
     ,' ' as Z_TAG_NO
     ,' ' as Z_MAC_TPL
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_STR
     ,0.000 as Z_AREA_PER_PC
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_PCS],0.000) as Z_WT_PER_PC
     ,isnull([CON_MAT],' ') as Z_CON_MAT
     ,isnull([CONSUME_BATCHES],' ') as Z_CONSUME_BATCHE
     ,' ' as Z_SHAPE_CODE
     ,' ' as Z_INV_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_WBS1
     ,' ' as Z_WBS2
     ,' ' as Z_WBS3
     ,' ' as Z_BBSNO
     ,' ' as Z_PROD_MARK
     ,0.00 as Z_MW_SPA
     ,0.00 as Z_CW_SPA
     ,' ' as Z_MW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_CW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_PIECES
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG2
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG2
     ,' ' as Z_BBS_DESC
     ,isnull([PLANT_D],' ') as PLANT_D
     ,isnull([STOR_LOC_D],' ') as LGORT_D
     ,isnull([MATL_NO_D],' ') as MATNR_D
     ,isnull([QUANTITY_D],0.000) as QUANTITY_D
     ,isnull([CHARG_D],' ') as CHARG_D
     ,[SHIFT] as SHIFT
     ,' ' as REV_STATUS
     ,' ' as PROD_STATUS
     ,'A' as STATUS
     ,' ' as ERROR_CD
     ,[REC_TYPE] as REC_TYPE
     ,' ' as PROC_TS
     ,[INTERFACE_ID] as INTER_ID
     ,'00000000' as UDATE
     ,'000000' as UTIME
     ,'BGDJOBS' as USERID
     ,' ' as NDS_SALE_ORDER
     ,' ' as ORDER_ITEM
     FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] where status='T'

sink.preCopyScript:
insert into sapsr3.ympct_nsa_gr
  SELECT MANDT, CHARG, MATNR_AIM, TIMESTAMP, MATNR_ACH, QUANTITY, MEINS, AUART, AUFNR, BLDAT, BUDAT, PCODE
     , PLANT
     , LGORT
     , NO_OF_GI_REC
     , VBELN
     , POSNR
     , MBLNR
     , MJAHR
     , RUECK
     , RMZHL
     , REV_RUECK
     , REV_RMZHL
     , Z_HEAT_NO
     , Z_THEO_WT
     , Z_SHIFT
     , Z_PROD_DATE
     , Z_MILL_SOURCE
     , Z_LENGTH
     , Z_STANDARD
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_A
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_B
     , Z_BAT_LOCATOR_C
     , Z_PCS_PER_HEAT
     , Z_KG_PER_BLD
     , Z_PCS_PER_BLD
     , Z_KG_PER_PCS
     , Z_KG_PER_COIL
     , Z_ACT_COI_WT
     , Z_MAC_NO
     , Z_COIL_NO
     , Z_TOTAL_CUT
     , Z_TOTAL_BEND
     , Z_TOTAL_LINK
     , Z_CUT_PER_TON
     , Z_BEND_PER_TON
     , Z_LINK_PER_TON
     , Z_COU_GRA
     , Z_COU_REF
     , Z_NO_OF_END
     , Z_COU_DIA_1
     , Z_COU_DIA_2
     , Z_COU_TYPE_1
     , Z_COU_TYPE_2
     , Z_NO_OF_PNT
     , Z_TAG_NO
     , Z_MAC_TPL
     , Z_NO_OF_STR
     , Z_AREA_PER_PC
     , Z_WT_PER_PC
     , Z_CON_MAT
     , Z_CONSUME_BATCHE
     , Z_SHAPE_CODE
     , Z_INV_LEN
     , Z_WBS1
     , Z_WBS2
     , Z_WBS3
     , Z_BBSNO
     , Z_PROD_MARK
     , Z_MW_SPA
     , Z_CW_SPA
     , Z_MW_LEN
     , Z_CW_LEN
     , Z_PIECES
     , Z_CW_OVR_HANG1
     , Z_CW_OVR_HANG2
     , Z_MW_OVR_HANG1
     , Z_MW_OVR_HANG2
     , Z_BBS_DESC
     , PLANT_D
     , LGORT_D
     , MATNR_D
     , QUANTITY_D
     , CHARG_D
     , SHIFT
     , REV_STATUS
     , PROD_STATUS
     , STATUS
     , ERROR_CD
     , REC_TYPE
     , PROC_TS
     , INTER_ID
     , UDATE
     , UTIME
     , USERID
     , NDS_SALE_ORDER
     , ORDER_ITEM
     FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR_STAGING] where STATUS = 'T'

text.value: update [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] set status='Y' where status='T' and CHARG= @{pipeline().parameters.CHARG} and ID_MESSAGE= @{pipeline().parameters.ID_MESSAGE};
